titles.title: Designating September 16, 2017, as "Isaac M. Wise Temple Day".
Designating September 16, 2017, as "Isaac M. Wise Temple Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of Isaac M. Wise Temple Day.
Recognizes the importance of the Isaac M. Wise Temple in Cincinnati, Ohio, in:
U.S. Jewish history; establishing Cincinnati as a great center of Jewish life, and contributing to religious life in the United States.
